casebody.data:
Luis OTINIANO, Appellant,
v.
The BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON TRUST COMPANY, NA f/k/a The Bank of New York Trust Company, NA, as Successor by Merger to Chase Bank National Association as Trustee for Bear Stearns Backed Securities Trust 2006-2; Mortgage Electronic Registration Systems, Inc.; Country Place Community Association, Inc. ; Jorge Mona; Esmeralda Mona; John Doe n/k/a Guillermo Otiniano; and Jane Doe, Appellees. Case No. 2D17-4287 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District. Opinion filed June 6, 2018

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
